section.p: You settle down in the common room for a drink. There is a familiar face at the next table. It is one of the brigands who robbed you! With a cry of rage, you give him a hearty blow with the bottom of your tankard.
You ought to be able to beat him after getting the first blow. Assuming you win, you can take the he has on him. Then you had better leave before the militiamen turn up and start asking questions. .
